subject: Re: Creation of a Webform
preview: Hi Cindy, thank you! Our PI team are reviewing this and I will come back with any amendments. Liz.

full_threads.body: Hi Cindy, thank you! Our PI team are reviewing this and I will come back with any amendments. Liz.

Hi Elizabeth.

Just letting you know that we have completed the form creation.
URL: https://oceanunderwriting.com.au/engineers-surveyors-proposal-form/

It's now ready for review and please let us know if there are any changes needed and we're happy to assist.

Hi Elizabeth,

The title has been updated, and I’ve also updated the URL slug to match the new title.
Here’s the updated URL: https://oceanunderwriting.com.au/engineers-surveyors-proposal-form/
Update! Title/heading should be: Engineers & Surveyors Proposal Form

Thanks Cindy, this is looking great!

Can we make the heading/title:

Professional Indemnity Proposal Form - Construction Professionals

Hi Elizabeth.

Apologies I have not attached it.

Here: https://oceanunderwriting.com.au/indemnity-proposal-form/

Hi Team - where is the form for me to review I cant see a link or attachment?

Thanks

Hi Elizabeth.

Just a quick update on our progress with the form.

We’ve completed adding the questions by section and are now working on refining the layout to ensure consistency across the page.

We’ll also be cross-checking the form against the PDF you provided to make sure everything has been copied accurately.

In the meantime, could you please review the page and let us know if you have any feedback or changes you’d like us to address as we continue working?

Hi Elizabeth,

Noted on this.
We’ll get started today and will share an update on our progress by Thursday.

We’ll keep you posted!

Thank you Cindy!

Ideally we need to get this going ASAP so that I we can start using it from next week - let me know if this is achievable on your end? We are flexible but there is some urgency with this one

Thank you!

Hi Elizabeth,

We can absolutely create the webform as requested using the Gravity Forms plugin currently installed on the website.

Just a quick heads-up — since this involves a more customized layout (especially the table-style form), it would fall under our custom development scope. We’re estimating around 3–5 hours for this task, depending on the final layout and level of detail required.

We'll be building the form based on the sections outlined in the PDF you provided.

This is currently scheduled to begin later this week, but if there’s a specific deadline or urgency, please let us know and we’ll do our best to adjust accordingly.

We’ll reach out if there’s anything we need from your end as we move forward.

Thanks, and looking forward to getting this underway!
Ocean Underwriting | Webform Creation - custom dev added here.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Cindy Valderama

full_threads.body:
Hi @cindy this can be a custom demv as it may take more than 2 hours. This
can be added to @manuel pipeline and he can confirm the esitmated time to work on this. Thanks!

Hi Team


Pls can you let me know if you are able to create a webform version of quite a lengthy proposal form?


We want to be able to send the link to brokers via email so they can complete it for their insurance renewal


I've attached the prop which has all the question fields required. I've crossed out the pages and sections that we don't need.


Let me know if this is something you can help with? Happy to provide more info or answer questions.


Thank you


Elizabeth Pace

Marketing and Communications Manager

Ocean Underwriting Pty Ltd

+61 9186 6096 | + 61 452 067 587

elizabeth.pace@oceanunderwriting.com.au

www.oceanunderwriting.com.au

Level 6, 60-62 Clarence Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000
